name: Chroma utils
tagline: Some support routines for manipulating files from chroma
body:
Some support routines for manipulating files from chroma.
Includes "strippers" that extract data (ensemble) files from various
Chroma output files. Also contains some fitters.

## File extractors
There are "strippers" - codes in chroma_utils/main/strippers - that are used to extract "ensemble" files from xml or binary files generated from chroma

## Auxilliary support
There are I/O and Map manipulation routines in   chroma_utils/lib/adat

## Some fitters
There are some simple fitter codes in  main/fitters
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
